name: Cosmogon
description:
How to play:

"Match the rotating velocity with the Endurance" - Cooper

Fill out the outer shape as much as possible while avoiding to touch the edges.

Bounce to the tune and fly to the moon.

Credits:

Christiaan Bloemendaal - @Chrusb

Christian Kokott - @dotKokott
